actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to insure that cost-of-living increases in supplemental security income benefits are granted to recipients of such benefits in all States, and to prevent reductions in such benefits because of social security benefit increases.

summary.text: Requires cost-of-living increases under title XVI (supplemental security income benefits) of the Social Security Act to be granted to recipients of such benefits in all States, and prohibits reductions in such benefits because of social security benefit increases.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to insure that cost-of-living increases in supplemental security income benefits are granted to recipients of such benefits in all States, and to prevent reductions in such benefits because of social security benefit increases.
